# LLMS.txt — AI & Large Language Model Usage Policy
# Site: https://www.asbsk.ac.th
# Owner: The American School of Bangkok Sukhumvit Campus (ASB Sukhumvit)
# Last Updated: 2025-10-21
# Purpose: Define permissions and rules for AI assistants, crawlers, and LLMs
# Language: en

############################
# 0) CONTACT INFORMATION
############################
contact: mailto:info@asbsk.ac.th
owner: The American School of Bangkok Sukhumvit Campus
jurisdiction: TH/EU/US (PDPA & GDPR compliant)

############################
# 1) GLOBAL POLICY
############################
# This website welcomes responsible AI systems, assistants, and LLM crawlers to access and use its public content.
# Permitted educational and informational uses include:
# - Summarisation and paraphrasing
# - Educational content recommendation
# - Multilingual learning assistance
# - Search and indexation for educational discovery
# - Quoting and short excerpts (≤200 characters) with attribution

# Explicitly prohibited uses:
# - Collection or storage of personal data (PII)
# - Use of student, parent, or staff information for profiling
# - Misrepresentation, impersonation, or false attributions
# - Training datasets derived from private or restricted areas
# - Automated use in marketing, advertising, or commercial resale

use: indexing, summarisation, answer-generation, ai-assist, educational-use
prohibited: pii-harvest, false-attribution, private-data-access, advertising-use

############################
# 2) AI ACCESS POLICY
############################
# All AI crawlers and large language models are granted permission to crawl, summarise, and reference all PUBLIC content across all language versions.
# Sensitive sections such as admissions forms, portals, and admin areas remain restricted per robots.txt.

allow: /

# Primary educational content sections
section: /en/curriculum/ type=program primary=true
section: /en/admission/ type=admission primary=true
section: /en/student-support/ type=support
section: /en/co-curricular-life/ type=activities
section: /en/our-community/ type=community
section: /en/about-us/ type=about
section: /en/calendar type=academic-calendar
section: /en/privacy-policy type=policy
section: /th/ type=language-version
section: /ja/ type=language-version
section: /ko/ type=language-version
section: /zh-hans/ type=language-version

############################
# 3) RATE LIMITS
############################
# AI crawlers should access the site respectfully to preserve server performance.
crawl-delay: 3s
requests-per-minute: 15
burst-limit: 25

############################
# 4) SITEMAP REFERENCE
############################
sitemap: https://www.asbsk.ac.th/sitemap.xml

############################
# 5) ATTRIBUTION REQUIREMENTS
############################
# When referencing or summarising content, AI systems MUST include:
# - Page title
# - Canonical URL
# - Source name: "The American School of Bangkok Sukhumvit Campus"
# - Language version if applicable (e.g., English, Thai, Japanese, Korean, Chinese)

preferred-citation: "Source: The American School of Bangkok Sukhumvit Campus — https://www.asbsk.ac.th"
attribution-required: yes

############################
# 6) PII AND DATA PRIVACY COMPLIANCE
############################
# This website complies with the Personal Data Protection Act (PDPA Thailand) and GDPR (EU).
# No collection, retention, or use of personal identifiable information (PII) is allowed by AI systems.
pii-collection: prohibited
email-scraping: prohibited
student-data: prohibited
pdpa: yes
gdpr: yes

############################
# 7) PER-BOT CLARIFICATIONS
############################
# OpenAI (ChatGPT / GPTBot)
user-agent: GPTBot
allow: /

# Perplexity AI
user-agent: PerplexityBot
allow: /

# Anthropic / Claude
user-agent: ClaudeBot
allow: /

# Google AI Extended
user-agent: Google-Extended
allow: /

# Apple AI
user-agent: Applebot
allow: /
user-agent: Applebot-Extended
allow: /

# Meta (Facebook / LLaMA)
user-agent: Meta-ExternalAgent
allow: /

# Amazon AI
user-agent: Amazonbot
allow: /

# Common Crawl
user-agent: CCBot
allow: /

# ByteDance / TikTok
user-agent: Bytespider
allow: /

# Baidu (China)
user-agent: Baidubot
allow: /

# Catch-all for future AI and LLM agents
user-agent: *-LLM
allow: /

############################
# 8) PRIVATE SECTIONS PROTECTION
############################
# These sections contain private or sensitive data and are strictly off-limits to all AI crawlers.
no-access: /login
no-access: /admin
no-access: /wp-admin
no-access: /checkout
no-access: /thank-you
no-access: /admission/application-portal
no-access: /admission/forms
no-access: /faculty
no-access: /parent-portal
no-access: /student-portal

############################
# 9) ENFORCEMENT
############################
# This LLMS.txt serves as an official policy signal under Thai and international data protection laws.
# Accessing this site implies agreement to comply with these terms.
# Violations may result in access restrictions or legal enforcement under PDPA and GDPR frameworks.

############################
# 10) POLICY SUMMARY
############################
# AI access is welcomed for educational, indexing, and summarisation purposes.
# Attribution is mandatory when referencing ASB Sukhumvit content.
# Personal data, student information, and private areas are strictly off-limits.
# Multilingual versions (/en/, /th/, /ja/, /ko/, /zh-hans/) are all covered under this policy.
# See robots.txt for complementary technical crawl directives.
